BR.name: LEGO® The Lord of the Rings™
BR.description: Baseado nos filmes da Trilogia O Senhor dos Anéis, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings leva os jogadores através dos acontecimentos da épica história, reimaginada com o humor e a infinita variedade da jogabilidade LEGO. Com a perigosa tarefa de destruir um anel mágico antigo que ameaça tudo o que é bom, Frodo é forçado a deixar sua pacífica casa. Mas o anel quer ser encontrado e a estrada para a Montanha da Perdição, o único lugar onde ele pode ser destruído, será perigosa e repleta de Orcs e coisas repugnantes. Para ajudar Frodo, uma sociedade é formada - Aragorn, o guarda, Gandalf, o Mago, Legolas, o Elfo, Gimli, o Anão, Boromir, um homem de Gondor, e os Hobbit amigos de Frodo, Sam, Merry e Pippin. Os jogadores revivem a lenda através das minifiguras Lego, explorando maravilhas, resolvendo enigmas eternos, e superando infinitos inimigos em sua missão para destruir o Anel.

CA.name: LEGO® The Lord of the Rings™
CA.description: Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings takes players through the epic story events reimagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play. Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to be found and the road to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed, will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things. To help Frodo, a Fellowship is formed - Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo’s Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin. Players relive the legend through the LEGO minifigures, as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles, and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy the Ring.

MX.name: LEGO® The Lord of the Rings™
MX.description: Basado en la trilogía de películas de El Señor de los Anillos, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings lleva a los jugadores a través de eventos épicos reimaginados con el humor y la variedad sin fin de LEGO. Confiado con la peligrosa tarea de destruir un antiguo anillo mágico que amenaza todo lo que es bueno, Frodo es forzado a dejar su tranquilo hogar. Pero el anillo quiere ser encontrado y el camino al Monte del Destino, el único lugar donde puede ser destruido, será arriesgado y lleno de orcos y otras cosas peores. Para ayudar a Frodo, es creada una Hermandad - Aragorn el Montaraz, Gandalf el Mago, Legolas el Elfo, Gimli el Enano, Boromir, un Hombre de Gondor, y Sam, Merry y Pippin, los amigos hobbit de Frodo. Los jugadores reviven la leyenda a través de las minifiguras LEGO, explorando maravillas, resolviendo enigmas inmemoriables, y venciendo a innumerables enemigos en su búsqueda para destruir el Anillo.

US.description: Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO® The Lord of the Rings takes players through the epic story events reimagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play. Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to be found and the road to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed, will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things. To help Frodo, a Fellowship is formed - Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo’s Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin. Players relive the legend through the LEGO minifigures, as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles, and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy the Ring.
